The following decomposition of a Cartesian product is useful for counting pairs of integers. Roughly speaking, the product below is partitioned by parallel lines on
I\times I = \bigoplus_{\stackrel{n}{a}}\bigoplus_{\stackrel{1\leq t\leq \frac{n}{d},}{(t,\frac{n}{d}) = 1}}\{(x,y)\in I\times I\mid ax + by\equiv td\pmod {n}\} .
